data.Vojtěch Peterka:
Vojtech Peterka is a 26-year-old former local activist who enjoys Rubik's cube, theatre and photography. He is kind and caring, but can also be very cowardly and a bit impatient.

He is Czech. He didn't finish school. He is allergic to nickel. He is obsessed with over-knee socks.

Physically, Vojtech is in good shape. He is very short with olive skin, black hair and brown eyes.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. He was raised by his father, his mother having left when he was young.

He is currently in a relationship with Veronika Jindrová. Veronika is 10 years older than him and works as a legal secretary.

Vojtěch's best friend is a former local activist called Martin Skoumal. They are inseparable. He also hangs around with Petr Hajný and Tereza Boušová. They enjoy binge-watching boxed sets together.

basic_information.Name: Vojtěch Peterka
basic_information.Relationship status: In a relationship with Veronika Jindrová

physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: clipped, little, short, slim, squat, stumpy

personality.Hobbies: Rubik's cube, theatre, photography, binge-watching boxed sets, helping old ladies across the road, meditation, bowling

background.Early years: Vojtěch grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. He was raised by his father, his mother having left when he was young
background.Formative years: Vojtěch got his first job as a local activist at age 18. Vojtěch dropped out of school.
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His mother leaving when he was one

veronika_jindrová.Relationship: They get on well but lack chemistry

petr_hajný.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

tereza_boušová.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

terezie_horová.Reason for breakup: Terezie wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'

timeline.2011: Relationship with Terezie Horová ends (Terezie wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr') Starts work at the Green Party as a local activist
timeline.2013: Relationship with Jitka Jeníková ends (Jitka wanted somebody less dastardly)
timeline.2019: Resigns from job as a local activist at the Green Party
